name: Tokyo
hint: Capital of Japan, world's most populous metro area

hint: Capital of China, home to the Forbidden City

hint: India's financial capital, formerly known as Bombay

hint: Capital territory of India, ancient Mughal city

hint: Capital of South Korea, divided from the North by a DMZ

name: Bangkok

hint: Capital of Saudi Arabia, located in the central desert plateau

name: Istanbul
hint: Transcontinental city straddling Europe and Asia across the Bosphorus

name: Singapore

name: Osaka
hint: Japan's kitchen, a major port city known for street food and Osaka Castle

name: Dhaka
hint: Capital of Bangladesh, one of the most densely populated cities in the world

name: Islamabad
hint: Purpose-built capital of Pakistan, nestled against the Margalla Hills
